choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, or cashews
### Assistant:

Sure! Here is a sample meal plan for you for the week:
Monday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs (use chicken breast instead of dairy) with spinach and tomatoes
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (no garlic or almonds)
- Dinner: Baked salmon with sweet potato and green beans (no honey, no cashews)
Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt (use coconut milk instead of dairy) with berries and granola (no almonds)
- Lunch: Quinoa salad with chicken breast, cucumber, tomato, and avocado (no garlic)
- Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu, broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers (no honey, no cashews)
Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie with spinach, banana, almond milk, and protein powder (no dairy)
- Lunch: Turkey burger on a gluten-free bun with sweet potato fries (no garlic)
- Dinner: Grilled shrimp with roasted vegetables (no honey, no cashews)
Thursday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with almond milk, banana, and walnuts (no dairy, no garlic)
- Lunch: Chicken breast salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomato, and avocado (no garlic)
- Dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with tofu and quinoa (no honey, no cashews)
Friday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs (use chicken breast instead of dairy) with spinach and tomatoes
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (no garlic or almonds)
- Dinner: Baked salmon with sweet potato and green beans (no honey, no cashews)
Saturday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt (use coconut milk instead of dairy) with berries and granola (no almonds)
- Lunch: Quinoa salad with chicken breast, cucumber, tomato, and avocado (no garlic)
- Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu, broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers (no honey, no cashews)
Sunday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie with spinach, banana, almond milk, and protein powder (no dairy)
- Lunch: Turkey burger on a gluten-free bun with sweet potato fries (no garlic)
- Dinner: Grilled shrimp with roasted vegetables (no honey, no cashews)
I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
